query:
SELECT p.id as project_id, p.name as project_name,
       (SELECT id FROM users WHERE role = 'owner' LIMIT 1) as owner_id,
       (SELECT id FROM users WHERE role = 'project_manager' LIMIT 1) as pm_id,
       (SELECT id FROM users WHERE role = 'field_engineer' LIMIT 1) as engineer_id,
       (SELECT id FROM users WHERE role = 'qc_inspector' LIMIT 1) as qc_id
FROM projects p
WHERE p.name = 'โครงการบ้านพักอาศัย 2 ชั้น'
LIMIT 1;
